com.guidewire.util.webservices
Class ThreadSafeProxy

java.lang.Object
  com.guidewire.util.webservices.ThreadSafeProxy

public abstract class ThreadSafeProxy
extends java.lang.Object

Internal class that creates a thread safe wrapper around a potentially non-thread safe class by maintaining a pool of such classes and allocating an instance of the class per method call. Assumes an instance of the underlying class is stateless.
